Reference

Admixtools programs

qp3pop()

Estimate f3 statistics

qpdstat()

Estimate f4 statistics

qpadm()

Estimate admixture weights

qpgraph()

Compute the fit of an admixture graph

Wrapper functions

qp3pop_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qp3Pop program

qpadm_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qpAdm program

qpdstat_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qpDstat program

qpgraph_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qpGraph program

Parsing functions

parse_qp3pop_output()

Read qp3Pop output file

parse_qpadm_output()

Read qpAdm output file

parse_qpdstat_output()

Read qpDstat output file

parse_qpgraph_graphfile()

Read qpGraph graph file

parse_qpgraph_output()

Read qpGraph output file

Plotting functions

plot_comparison()

Plot a comparison of two runs of qpgraph or two runs of qpadm

plot_graph()

Plot an admixture graph

plot_graph_map()

Plot an admixture graph on a map

plot_map()

Plot samples on a map

plotly_graph()

Plot an admixture graph using plotly

Resampling functions

qp3pop_resample_inds() qpdstat_resample_inds() qpadm_resample_inds() qpgraph_resample_inds()

Run models while leaving out individuals

qp3pop_resample_snps() qpdstat_resample_snps() qpadm_resample_snps() qpgraph_resample_snps()

Run models while leaving out SNP blocks

Reading and writing

extract_f2()

Compute and store blocked f2 statistics

extract_counts()

Extract and store data needed to compute blocked f2

f2_from_precomp()

Read blocked f2 statistics from disk

f2_from_geno()

Read f2 jackknife blocks from genotype data

read_packedancestrymap()

Read genotype data from packedancestrymap files

packedancestrymap_to_aftable()

Read allele frequencies from packedancestrymap files

Graph topology

find_graphs()

Find well fitting admixture graphs

random_admixturegraph()

Generate a random admixture graph

summarize_triples()

Summarize triples across graphs

qpadm_models()

Return all valid qpAdm models for an admixturegraph

Everything

admixtools

Lightweight R implementations of some AdmixTools programs.

afs_to_f2_blocks()

Compute all pairwise f2 statistics

ancestrymap_to_aftable()

Read allele frequencies from ancestrymap files

compare_fits2()

Compare the fit of two qpgraph models

compare_fits3()

Compare the fit of two qpgraph models

compare_fits4()

Compare the fit of two qpgraph models

decompose_graph()

Find all trees which are part of the admixture graph

delete_groups()

Delete groups

desimplify_graph()

Add two nodes before each admixture node

extract_afs()

Compute and store blocked allele frequency data

extract_counts()

Extract and store data needed to compute blocked f2

extract_f2()

Compute and store blocked f2 statistics

extract_f2_subset()

Copy a subset of f2-statistics to a new directory

extract_samples()

Extract samples from packedancestrymap files

f2()

Estimate f2 statistics

f2_from_geno()

Read f2 jackknife blocks from genotype data

f2_from_precomp()

Read blocked f2 statistics from disk

find_graphs()

Find well fitting admixture graphs

get_block_lengths()

Find LD-independent blocks

graph_flipadmix()

Find all valid graphs which result from flipping one admixture edge

graph_minusone()

Find all graphs which result from removing one admixture edge

graph_minusplus()

Find all graphs which result from adding and removing one admixture edge

graph_plusone()

Find all graphs which result from adding one admixture edge

graphmod_pavel()

Return all graphs created from permuting a subclade

group_samples()

Group precomputed data

lazadm()

Estimate admixture weights

make_resample_inds_fun()

Takes a function qpfun which takes f2_blocks as input Returns a function which will repeadetly evaluate qpfun on a subset of all samples, returning a nested data frame

make_resample_snps_fun()

Takes a function qpfun which takes f2_blocks as input Returns a function which will repeadetly evaluate qpfun on jackknife or bootstrap resamplings of the f2_blocks, returning a nested data frame

msprime_sim()

Generate msprime simulation code from admixture graph

newick_to_edges()

Turn a newick format tree to a matrix of edges

node_counts()

Count how often each node in graph occurs in other graphs

node_signature()

Returns a signature of a graph consisting of the left and right descendent leaf nodes of each internal node (sorted and concatenated)

packedancestrymap_to_aftable()

Read allele frequencies from packedancestrymap files

parse_qp3pop_output()

Read qp3Pop output file

parse_qpadm_output()

Read qpAdm output file

parse_qpdstat_output()

Read qpDstat output file

parse_qpgraph_graphfile()

Read qpGraph graph file

parse_qpgraph_output()

Read qpGraph output file

plink_to_aftable()

Read allele frequencies from PLINK files

plot_comparison()

Plot a comparison of two runs of qpgraph or two runs of qpadm

plot_graph()

Plot an admixture graph

plot_graph_map()

Plot an admixture graph on a map

plot_map()

Plot samples on a map

plotly_graph()

Plot an admixture graph using plotly

qp3pop()

Estimate f3 statistics

qp3pop_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qp3Pop program

qpadm()

Estimate admixture weights

qpadm_models()

Return all valid qpAdm models for an admixturegraph

qpadm_pairs()

Compute all pairwise qpwave p-values

qpadm_rotate()

Compute all pairwise qpadm p-values

qpadm_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qpAdm program

qpdstat()

Estimate f4 statistics

qpdstat_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qpDstat program

qpgraph()

Compute the fit of an admixture graph

qpgraph_precompute_f3()

Compute f3-statistics from f2-statistics.

qpgraph_wrapper()

Wrapper function around the original qpGraph program

random_admixturegraph()

Generate a random admixture graph

random_newick()

Generate a random, binary graph with n terminal nodes

read_ancestrymap()

Read genotype data from ancestrymap files

read_f2()

Read blocked f2 estimates from disk

read_packedancestrymap()

Read genotype data from packedancestrymap files

read_plink()

Read genotype data from PLINK files

qp3pop_resample_inds() qpdstat_resample_inds() qpadm_resample_inds() qpgraph_resample_inds()

Run models while leaving out individuals

qp3pop_resample_snps() qpdstat_resample_snps() qpadm_resample_snps() qpgraph_resample_snps()

Run models while leaving out SNP blocks

simplify_graph()

Remove redundant edges

split_mat()

Split a matrix into blocks

summarize_triples()

Summarize triples across graphs

test_cladality()

Test if two sets of populations form two clades

write_block_lengths()

Compute and write block lengths

write_dot()

Convert graph to dot format

write_f2()

Write blocked f2 estimates to disk

write_split_f2_block()

Compute f2 blocks and write them to disk
